articles.title: Lata Mangeshkar: The ‘mischievous’ girl who became reluctant actor after father’s death; refused to sing with Mohammed Rafi over royalty issues - The Indian Express
articles.description: On Lata Mangeshkar's 94th birth anniversary, we revisit her illustrious career and life. Lata started working at the age of 13 to take care of her family after her father's sudden demise. She went on to become the 'Nightingale of India' and sang over 20,000 s…
articles.content: One does not need to be a music aficionado to appreciate the voice of Lata Mangeshkar. It is something that cannot be ignored or missed, her voice is perhaps part of everyday lives of Indians, comfor… [+13813 chars]
